name: Paladin
headline: We deploy autonomous drones to 911 calls. Our software gives firstâ¦
description: When a 911 call is received, our drone is autonomously dispatched from a fire station and flies to the scene. It streams a live video feed back to the first responders, providing them with key situational details, such as the size and exact location of a fire.

founders.name: Divyaditya Shrivastava, Founder
founders.description: Founder and CEO of Paladin Drones

# 
Building the Future
of First Response
Equipped with the latest in LTE-enabled drone technology, First Responders can increase their
situational awareness, operate more effectively, and save lives.
[Book a Demo](http://paladindrones.io/</demo>)
## 
We Send
Autonomous Drones
to 911 Calls
Paladin is the all-in-one Drone as First Responder (DFR)
solution for Public Safety.
90 sec
Average response time
once a 911 call comes
in
670+
Emergency calls
supported per client
30000+
Miles logged by clients

## 
An Autonomous
Solution
All-in-one Paladin LTE System Technology
Revolutionizing First Response
1
### Drone is Deployed
Drone is deployed from department
2
### Drone En Route
Drone gets deployed from department
3
### Drone Gathers the Intel
Drone gets placed in route
4
### Drone Returns
Pilot hits the “return to home” button & drone returns
## 
Paladin Has Logged Over
20k Flights Across the Country
### Paladin has enabled us to continue our mission to be the best agency we can be
“We (the Forest Park Police Department) would not have been able to implement a DFR program if it wasn’t for Zach, Colin and the rest of the Paladin crew. Their dedication and tireless effort to not only provide unparalleled support but to also be a knowledgeable liaison with the FFA, DJI and other necessary services have enabled us to continue our mission to be the best agency we can be. Thank you for everything!”
![Forest Park GA Police Department](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6704475e037f03d37c7ba3ca/670d539b050c071d7a7e7de1_Badge-Forest-Park-GA.avif)
Forest Park, GA Police Department
Joshua Wilson
### In my opinion the Paladin DFR program has helped out tremendously
“I’m the drone operator for our new DFR program. I’ve been actively flying calls for service for a little over a week now and in my opinion the Paladin DFR program has helped out tremendously. I’m sure given more time and the multitude of the calls that we respond to we will continue to have great success.”
![Burlington NC Police Department](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6704475e037f03d37c7ba3ca/670d4e307e3fa237334411c3_Badge-Burlington-NC.avif)
Burlington, NC Police Department
Matt Cook MPO
### This enhances response, safety measures, and helps develop a plan of action
“The Drone Responder Program is designed to fly drones beyond visual line of sight, reaching scenes in under two minutes and providing real-time footage to officers and supervisors. This enhances response, safety measures, and helps develop a plan of action to keep our community members safe.”
![Burlington NC Police Department](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6704475e037f03d37c7ba3ca/670d4e307e3fa237334411c3_Badge-Burlington-NC.avif)
Burlington, NC Police Department
Lieutenant Megan Coggins
### Paladin has enabled us to continue our mission to be the best agency we can be
“We (the Forest Park Police Department) would not have been able to implement a DFR program if it wasn’t for Zach, Colin and the rest of the Paladin crew. Their dedication and tireless effort to not only provide unparalleled support but to also be a knowledgeable liaison with the FFA, DJI and other necessary services have enabled us to continue our mission to be the best agency we can be. Thank you for everything!”
![Forest Park GA Police Department](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6704475e037f03d37c7ba3ca/670d539b050c071d7a7e7de1_Badge-Forest-Park-GA.avif)
Forest Park, GA Police Department
Joshua Wilson
### In my opinion the Paladin DFR program has helped out tremendously
“I’m the drone operator for our new DFR program. I’ve been actively flying calls for service for a little over a week now and in my opinion the Paladin DFR program has helped out tremendously. I’m sure given more time and the multitude of the calls that we respond to we will continue to have great success.”
![Burlington NC Police Department](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6704475e037f03d37c7ba3ca/670d4e307e3fa237334411c3_Badge-Burlington-NC.avif)
Burlington, NC Police Department
Matt Cook MPO
### This enhances response, safety measures, and helps develop a plan of action
“The Drone Responder Program is designed to fly drones beyond visual line of sight, reaching scenes in under two minutes and providing real-time footage to officers and supervisors. This enhances response, safety measures, and helps develop a plan of action to keep our community members safe.”
![Burlington NC Police Department](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6704475e037f03d37c7ba3ca/670d4e307e3fa237334411c3_Badge-Burlington-NC.avif)
Burlington, NC Police Department
Lieutenant Megan Coggins
### Paladin has enabled us to continue our mission to be the best agency we can be
“We (the Forest Park Police Department) would not have been able to implement a DFR program if it wasn’t for Zach, Colin and the rest of the Paladin crew. Their dedication and tireless effort to not only provide unparalleled support but to also be a knowledgeable liaison with the FFA, DJI and other necessary services have enabled us to continue our mission to be the best agency we can be. Thank you for everything!”
![Forest Park GA Police Department](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6704475e037f03d37c7ba3ca/670d539b050c071d7a7e7de1_Badge-Forest-Park-GA.avif)
Forest Park, GA Police Department
Joshua Wilson
## 
One Platform for
All Your Needs
### 
Dock
DJI Dock 1: Docking station for autonomous or manual
deployment & recharging.
![Dock](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6704475e037f03d37c7ba3ca/67108ca24faa84026ff32ebc_Dock-04.avif)
### 
FAA Compliance
End-to-end support for securing COAs, BVLOS waivers,
and ongoing FAA compliance.
![FAA Compliance](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6704475e037f03d37c7ba3ca/67099e5fc23fd3aa05d59c06_FAA-03.avif)
### 
Drones
Versatile drones equipped with advanced sensors and
thermal imaging. Knighthawk: American-made drone for
rapid response and reliability.
![Drones](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6704475e037f03d37c7ba3ca/67073c7b3e0855abfa076ac1_Drones.avif)
### 
Paladin EXT
Enables LTE cellular service for extended drone range and
reliable operations.
![Paladin EXT
](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6704475e037f03d37c7ba3ca/67073c7bb5eba3947d0605de_Paladin-EXT.avif)
### 
Watchtower
Central command for drone operations, featuring live video sharing and automated reporting for flight logs, compliance, and
performance.
![Watchtower](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6704475e037f03d37c7ba3ca/67097efa2b155a60c1cf7075_Watchtower-02.avif)
## 
Extend Your Range with
Cellular Connectivity
![Drone](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6704475e037f03d37c7ba3ca/67059f6da83f944fd035f0c2_Icon-Drone.svg)
With Cellular
![Charge](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6704475e037f03d37c7ba3ca/67059f6d101c3166d591366f_Icon-Charge.svg)
Single charge
![Drone](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6704475e037f03d37c7ba3ca/67059f6da83f944fd035f0c2_Icon-Drone.svg)
Radio Frequency
![Charge](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6704475e037f03d37c7ba3ca/67059f6d101c3166d591366f_Icon-Charge.svg)
Single charge
0 mi
0.5 mi
1 mi
3 mi
4 mi
5 mi
![Range](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6704475e037f03d37c7ba3ca/67059e1abfd44e240870e4bc_Icon-Range.svg)
### 
Extended Range
With LTE you get unlimited range
— 3–5 miles on a single charge.
![Frequency](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6704475e037f03d37c7ba3ca/67059e24ab9065572b8a8c52_Icon-Frequency.svg)
### 
Radio Frequency
The limitations of radio frequency
range being only .5 miles max.
![Deployment](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6704475e037f03d37c7ba3ca/67059e1afd815ab555a66f97_Icon-Deployment.svg)
### 
Autonomous Deployment
With LTE-enabled drones, you can
deploy autonomously from any
location.
With a partnership with T-Mobile drones can last even further.
![T-Mobile for Government](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6704475e037f03d37c7ba3ca/670d49435b6a0eae1cc2753c_T-Mobile-for-Government.svg)
## 
Building the Future of
First Response
The All-in-One DFR Solution for Public Safety
[Book a Demo](http://paladindrones.io/</demo>)
Subscribe to our Newsletter

generated_description:
**Paladin Drones: Revolutionizing First Response with Autonomous Technology**

Founded in 2018 and based in Houston, Texas, Paladin Drones is a groundbreaking company that is reshaping how emergency services respond to critical situations. As part of Y Combinator's Batch S18, Paladin Drones harnesses the power of autonomous drones to aid first responders when a 911 call is made. The immediate dispatch of a drone allows for live video feeds sent back to responders, giving them crucial situational details, like the size and exact location of a fire. 

Here’s what makes Paladin stand out:

- **Mission-Driven**: Paladin's mission is clear: to deploy drones that enhance situational awareness for first responders, helping them operate more effectively and save lives.

- **Impressive Metrics**: On average, drones are en route to emergency scenes within 90 seconds of a 911 call. Each client can manage over 670 emergency calls, logging upwards of 30,000 miles collectively. 

- **Comprehensive Offerings**: The company offers a suite of products designed around public safety, including:
  - **DJI Dock** for autonomous or manual deployment and recharging.
  - **Paladin EXT** to enable LTE cellular service, extending the range and reliability of operations.
  - **Watchtower**, a centralized command platform for real-time video sharing and automated flight reporting.

- **Market Enforcement**: The company operates in the 'saas', 'drones', and 'govtech' sectors and maintains a lean team of about 12 dedicated employees.

- **Community Impact**: Paladin Drones has flown over 20,000 flights across the country. Departments that have implemented their Drone as First Responder (DFR) program have reported enhanced operational efficiency, better safety measures, and improved responsiveness, vital for public safety and community trust.

- **Future Partnerships**: Their collaboration with T-Mobile for Government is expected to provide extended operational ranges, allowing drones to go beyond the limitations of traditional radio frequencies. 

As emergency response continues to evolve with technological advancements, Paladin Drones is positioned at the forefront, demonstrating that when seconds count, having aerial eyes and ears can make all the difference.

For more information, visit [Paladin Drones](http://paladindrones.io).
